certain vitamins are essential for normal appetite regulation.', 'Picky eater (can lead to hunger if not addressed) - Selective or overly cautious in food choices, which can result in limited intake and eventual hunger.', 'Food insecurity - Unstable access to sufficient amounts of affordable and nutritious food leading to chronic hunger.', 'Underfed child - A young individual not receiving adequate nutrition for proper growth, development, and well-being.', 'Empty pantry - An immediate indicator that a person may be unable to satisfy their dietary requirements due to lack of food supplies at home.', 'Lean and gaunt (due to lack of food) - Physical description reflecting the condition of someone who has severely restricted calorie intake, leading to visible signs of hunger-induced malnutrition.', 'Picky eater (can lead to hunger if not addressed) - A behavioral trait that can eventually result in limited food choices and potential hunger due to insufficient dietary variety or quantity.']
